summary: Mina Outfit by KURESE converted to SeveNbase with working weightslider and BBP
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u3popun.png[/IMG]
Mina Outfit converted to SevenBase with working weightslider and BBP, this conversion is standalone from the UNP one(thanks asianboy345 for letting me do it this way) so you don't need any other requirements other than any 7B body. It however shares the same .esp so they might not be compatible with each other.

Can be crafted at a forge in the Leather section.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oQhwEBV.png[/IMG]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992/?]Any SeveNBase body.[/url]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hyKTPfg.png[/IMG]
Use Nexus Mod Manager

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eV272UF.png[/IMG]
** All of KURESE's mod are open-source; meaning that he allows anyone to edit and improve upon his works without his permission as long as credits are given. **

KURESE for his original mod from Oblivion
asianboy345 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22101/?]Mina Armor - UNP[/url] and letting me do a standalone version from his.
Sevennity for SevenBase Bombshell
Crosscrusade
DemonHunter1986
Wast1980
author: Shockero
